DOC.brief_summary: The investigators planned to study the etiopathogenic factors of conotruncal cardiac defects regarding the relations between the metabolic, the genetic and the environmental factors which lead to these cardiopathy.
DOC.brief_title: Conotruncal Cardiac Defects and Nutrigenetic Etiopathogeny
DOC.criteria: Conotruncal cardiac defects patients and theirs mothers Weight: > 3750 g Syndromic conotruncal cardiac defects 22q11 deletion Holder's Patients whose mother's took antifolates before and during first pregnancy semester
